title: Mikado !!! (studio)
posting_body: Enjoy the serene and tranquil amenities of The Mikado Apartments in Los Angeles' prime location - Little Tokyo.
You're walking distance from the metro train, numerous shops, bakeries, and grocery stores, and centrally located right in the middle of the city.
CALL OR EMAIL TODAY TO SCHEDULE A TOUR !!!
WE'RE LOCATED AT 331 East 1st Street Los Angeles, CA, 90012
APPLY TODAY FOR 12 MONTH LEASE MOVE-IN DISCOUNT
-Many shops, cafes, and restaurants within walking distance.
Email or Call us to schedule a TOUR TODAY!!
I will answer calls Tues - Sat 8:30 am - 5:30 pm.
If you want to contact me on a Sunday, Monday, or if I do not answer please leave a voicemail or a text message and I will reach out to you as soon as possible.
